$$._: Explores ways of investigating an evolving structure of feeling in a device centric, datafied, more-than-real world.
Includes algorithms and blackbox artificial intelligence models as co-researchers in its more-than-quantitative approach.
Involves a conversation between two Geographers (one with a background in Computer Science, the other in qualitative methods).
Shows interdisciplinary work in progress, putting into practice opportunities and challenges of social media data analysis.
